data.chText: （尤指提供证据来）证实，证明，确认
data.enText: to state or show that sth is definitely true or correct, especially by providing evidence

data.chText: 裁员的传言后来得到了证实。
data.enText: Rumours of job losses were later confirmed.

data.chText: 他内疚的表情证实了我的猜疑。
data.enText: His guilty expression confirmed my suspicions.
Please write to confirm your reservation (= say that it is definite) .

data.chText: 他们是不是每个人都肯定过一定会来？
你能证实一下发生了什么事吗？
已经确定会议将于下个星期召开。
data.enText: It has been confirmed that the meeting will take place next week.
to make sb feel or believe sth even more strongly

data.chText: 在山里步行使他更加确信自己有恐高症。
data.enText: The walk in the mountains confirmed his fear of heights.

data.chText: 批准（职位、协议等）；确认；认可
data.enText: to make a position, an agreement, etc. more definite or official; to establish sb/sth firmly

data.chText: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。
data.enText: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.

data.chText: 他被正式任命在这个赛季剩下的时间内担任队长。
data.enText: He was confirmed as captain for the rest of the season.
to make sb a full member of the Christian Church

data.chText: 她出生一个月时受洗礼，十三岁时受坚信礼。
data.enText: She was baptized when she was a month old and confirmed when she was thirteen.

simple_means.memory_skill: con 表加强 + firm 坚定 → 非常肯定 → 证实

ex.enText: Tests have proved that the method works.

ex.chText: 你如何证明他在考试中作弊了？
ex.enText: How can you prove that he has cheated in the exam?

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指以事实等证明某事是真实的。

ex.chText: 那家公司的账目经调查员核实过。
ex.enText: The accounts of that company were certified by the investigators.

ex.chText: 她得出示她的健康证明。
ex.enText: She had to show the paper to certify that she was in good health.

synonyms.bx: 尤指经过某种检验而证实某事正确或真实。

ex.chText: 他们需要新的证据来证实他的说法。
ex.enText: They need new evidence to confirm his story.

ex.chText: 为了证实她的猜测，她需要做一些试验。
ex.enText: To confirm her conjecture, she has to do some tests.

synonyms.bx: 指通过更多的证据确定某事是真实的。

ex.chText: 他的研究证明了睡眠质量和工作表现之间的联系。
ex.enText: His study demonstrates the link between sleep quality and work performance.

ex.chText: 你得证明自己是靠得住的。
ex.enText: You have to demonstrate that you are reliable.

synonyms.bx: 指清楚地论证或证实某事。

ex.chText: 飞涨的物价说明了通货膨胀的严重程度。
ex.enText: Skyrocketing prices testify to the depth of the inflation.

ex.chText: 随处可见的废纸、烟头说明乱扔杂物的习惯并未得到根除。
ex.enText: The waste paper and cigarette ends that can be seen everywhere testify that littering hasn't been stubbed out.

synonyms.bx: 指清楚地说明某种情况，常后接介词 to。

tr: establish or strengthen as with new evidence or facts

example: The witnesses confirmed the victim's account

tr: administer the rite of confirmation to
example: the children were confirmed in their mother's faith

tr: support a person for a position
example: The Senate confirmed the President's candidate for Secretary of Defense

value.def: If something confirms what you believe, suspect, or fear, it shows that it is definitely true.

example.ex: X-rays have confirmed that he has not broken any bones...
These new statistics confirm our worst fears about the depth of the recession...
example.tran: 这些新的统计数据证实经济衰退已经严重到我们最为担忧的境地。

example.ex: This confirms what I suspected all along.
example.tran: 这证实了我一直以来的怀疑。

example.ex: They took her resignation from Bendix as confirmation of their suspicions.
example.tran: 他们认为她从本迪克斯公司辞职证实了他们的怀疑。

value.def: If you confirm something that has been stated or suggested, you say that it is true because you know about it.

example.ex: The spokesman confirmed that the area was now in rebel hands...
example.tran: 这位发言人证实该地区现已落入叛乱分子手中。

example.ex: He confirmed what had long been feared...
example.tran: 他证实了人们长期以来的担心。

example.ex: She glanced over at James for confirmation.
example.tran: 她扫了詹姆斯一眼，想得到他的确认。

value.def: If you confirm an arrangement or appointment, you say that it is definite, usually in a letter or on the telephone.

example.ex: You make the reservation, and I'll confirm it in writing.
example.tran: 你来预订，我会去函确认。

value.tran: (通常指通过信件或电话)确定，确认(安排或预约)

example.ex: Travel arrangements are subject to confirmation by State Tourist Organisations.
example.tran: 旅行安排有待州旅游组织的确认。

value.def: If someone is confirmed, they are formally accepted as a member of a Christian church during a ceremony in which they say they believe what the church teaches.

example.ex: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
example.tran: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

value.tran: 为…施坚振礼（或坚信礼）(从而正式成为基督教会的成员)

example.ex: ...when I was being prepared for Confirmation...
example.tran: 在我为领受坚振礼做准备的时候

example.ex: Flu prevented her from attending her daughter's confirmation.
example.tran: 流感使她没能参加女儿的坚振礼。

value.def: If something confirms you in your decision, belief, or opinion, it makes you think that you are definitely right.

example.ex: It has confirmed me in my decision not to become a nun.
example.tran: 这使我更加坚定了不做修女的决心。

value.tran: 使坚定，使确信(自己的决定、信仰或观点)

value.def: If someone confirms their position, role, or power, they do something to make their power, position, or role stronger or more definite.

example.ex: Williams has confirmed his position as the world's number one snooker player.
example.tran: 威廉姆斯巩固了自己世界头号斯诺克选手的地位。

value.tran: 加强，巩固(地位、角色或权力)

value.def: If something confirms you as something, it shows that you definitely deserve a name, role, or position.

example.ex: His new role could confirm him as one of our leading actors.
example.tran: 他的新角色会确保他跻身我们的一流演员之列。

value.tran: 巩固，确保(某人的名声、角色或地位)

partsOfSpeech.dec: af 加强 + firm 坚定 → 非常坚定 → 肯定
af 表加强 + firm 坚定 + ative 有…倾向（性质）的，属于…的 → 肯定的
con 加强 + firm 坚定 → 非常肯定 → 证实
in 不 + firm 坚定 → 不坚固的；虚弱的
infirm 不坚固的；虚弱的 + ary 场所 → 接纳虚弱者的地方 → 医务室
com 共同 + par 平等 + ison → 平等地放在一起 → 比较
com 共同 + passion 感情 → 有共同感情 → 同情
com 共同 + patri 父亲 + ot 表人 → 同一个父亲 → 同胞
com 共同 + pon 放 + ent 人或物 → 放到一起〔组成其他事物的东西〕→ 成分
con 共同 + centric 中心的 → 同中心的
con 共同 + cord 心 → 同心协力 → 和睦
con 共同 + cur 跑，引申为发生 → 同时发生
con 共同 + flict 打 → 两边打斗 → 冲突
con 共同 + flu 流 + ence 表行为 → 流到一起 → 汇流
con 共同 + front 面 → 面对
con 共同 + nect 连接 → 连接；联合
con 共同 + sist 站 → 站在一起 → 一致
con 共同 + son 声音 + ant …的 → 共同的声音 → 一致的
con 共同 + spir 呼吸 + e → 沆瀣一气 → 同谋
con 共同 + tempor 时间 + ary …的 → 同时代的
cor 共同 + relate 联系 → 共同联系 → 相互关联
cor 共同 + respond 反应 → 相互反应 → 通信
com 表加强 + bat 打，击 → 打得非常激烈 → 格斗
com 表加强 + fort 强壮的 → 使〔精神〕强大 → 安慰
com 表加强 + memor 记忆 + ate 做，造成，使… → 纪念
com 表加强 + ment 思考，神智 → 努力把自己的思考〔表达出来〕→ 评论
com 表加强 + mot 动 + ion 表状态 → 到处都在动 → 动乱
com 表加强 + pact 合同 → 合同
com 表加强 + pel 驱动，推 → 一再推 → 强迫
com 表加强 + pet 追求 + e → 一再追求，永无止境 → 比赛
com 表加强 + plac 使满意 + ent 具有…性质的 → 对〔自己〕非常满意 → 自满的
com 表加强 + plet 满 + e → 全部满了 → 完成
com 表加强 + prehend 抓住 → 牢牢抓住 → 理解
com 表加强 + press 压 → 一再压 → 压缩
con 表加强 + cept 拿，握住 → 牢牢拿住 → 概念
con 表加强 + cis 切 + e → 切掉〔多余的〕→ 简洁的
con 表加强 + clud 关闭 + e → 关掉 → 结束
con 表加强 + dense 密集的 → 使变密集 → 凝结；浓缩
con 表加强 + duct 引导 → 管理；引导
con 表加强 + fid 相信 + ant 表人 → 让人信任的人 → 知己
con 表加强 + firm 坚定 → 非常肯定 → 证实
con 表加强 + greg 集合 + ate 做，造成，使… → 集合到一起 → 聚集
cor 表加强 + rect 正 → 一再改正 → 纠正
cor 表加强 + robor 力量 + ate 使… → 使更有力 → 使坚固
cor 表加强 + ros 咬 + ion 表动作 → 不断咬 → 腐蚀
cor 表加强 + rupt 断 →〔道德〕彻底断裂 → 腐败的
